reply_text:
Thank you much.

For trusting us Since the very beginning of my First clinic.

I sincerely hope we keep living Up to the expectations of our patients

review:
It was my first experience with Dr Riar and it went great. He patiently listened to my case with full attention (you'd be surprised how rare that can be with some doctors), and prescribed medicines and diet suggestions that gave quick relief and cured my illness timely. He even replied to some queries/concerns I had post-consultation over WhatsApp messages, which I highly appreciate. 
Though I hope I don't need to anytime soon, I'm sure I'll  be consulting with him again in future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very nice doctor. Explained very well about my illness. Talked very friendly and have a good personality.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He was wonderful doctor, He really examines properly and he also provides great advices about the problems. Heâ€™s really friendly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Pathetic experience with staff. Very rude and unprofessional staff. Doctor is good enough in terms of treatment, However charges are extremely unfair! I have done complete body testing from doctor clinic. They changed Rs.3300/- for tests costing Rs.2000/- only from the same lab. They charged me Rs.1300/- extra and still staff asked me to pay Rs.800/- for doctors consultation extra to read the report and tell me the issue! ****** **** ********!  A week ago i already paid Rs.800/- consultation+ Rs.2600 for medicine which was more than requirement. **** ***** **** ******** ***** ** ******* ***** *** ***** ******** ***** ** *** **** ********* **** *** ******* ************ Not recommended at all!!! *** *** ***** ** *** **** *** ** ***** ** **** ** *********** ********* ***
reply_text:
Hello Mr Rahul Yadav 

First of all we are sorry that you werenâ€™t satisfied with the staff you were in contact with.

We have verified everything that happened. 
We got in touch with the concerned receptionist and the lab as well. 
And it turned out that you have compiled a bundle of lies just because you were refused a Free consult.

1.Consult Fees is 800 RS and follow up is not charged till 5 days from anyone . Those 5 days are for getting any tests done in between or any other issue that may arise in between . You had consulted on 19 February last and now you wanted a free follow up after 17 days which is not normal. So the receptionist told you have to pay the fees which is pretty normal thing. I donâ€™t know why you were forcing him to get you a free consultation. 

2.Secondly , you yourself called the clinic to get tests done. And you wanted tests collected from your home which is very very far away from our clinic and staff was short due to Holi. However , we still sent someone to collect your tests and you were informed of the prices before. We confirmed with the lab and you were charged usual prices and nothing extra. 

3.Now coming to the price , we have the bill with us. Itâ€™s 1600 for the multiple medicines for entire month . 50/day therapy for very high quality drugs is just normal and I donâ€™t see anything wrong there. 800 was the fees , so total was around 2400.

4.If you want a Free Consult or you do not have the funds , you could request the receptionist for the same. Hundreds of patients are seen free or at discounted prices wherever we know that the patient genuinely cannot afford .But you cannot threaten or use abusive language. We wonâ€™t be blackmailed like that. 

5.We respect our patients as well as our staff equally. You were looking for a reconsult after 17 days from the initial consult. If you didnâ€™t like the services in the beginning , why were you looking to consult again ? 

Our Analysis of Everything - if you were given a free consultation 17 days after your initial consult - you wouldnâ€™t have maligned us. 


Anyways 
Good luck

tags: Doctor friendliness,
Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We visited the doctor in last week of July'22 for taking meds for my mother's leg pain. I did not liked the doctor for the following reasons:
** *** **** *** ********* ***** ****** ********* **** *****2. He is having a small medicine counter in his clinic ** ** ** ******* *** ***** ** ********* ******* ***** *** ******** ** ******* ***** *** ** ******** ** *** **** *** he gave two injections in both legs saying that swelling will reduce. *** ** ***** now she is having more pain and cant even sit and stand properly.  **** * ***** **** ** ******* **** ** **** ********** ******* ******** *** ***** ********4. In single consultation, he had charged approx Rs. 3700 which includes his fees (Rs.800) and medicines. It is clearly a very high charge for small consultation.
** ** **** ******* **** ******* ****** ******* ******** ***** *** ********* ****** ** ******* ******* ** **** *** ******** ** ****** *** ***** ** **********
reply_text:
The patient visited us with unbearable pain on July 16. 
Was unable to walk. And with mouth ulcers from 1 week of probably taking some medicines. 
However when the patient visited back on 29 July , she was much improved . 
And she took the medicines for one month.

Of course  they would cost that much . If the patient wasnâ€™t fine in first place , why she had follow up ?


Ultimately it all comes to cost .

For free you may visit any govt hospital .

Always blaming the quality medicines isnâ€™t a great choice .

You already know the consult fees before , why making it a hue and cry later.

And you were given only the relevant medicines and told that this treatment would take long .


However , take care of her and she would require  long treatment.

review: Dr Aman, Trust me he is one of the gem. I have been consulting him from last 6 years. Currently my full family was found +ve and this man treated every single person of my family. My wifeâ€™s situation was severe but he always said that donâ€™t get panic and just follow the medications. Today she is recovering. For me he is god. I was loosing hope but he always stood beside and replied of my every single text messages. He is working tirelessly for the patients. I wish you all the success and good health to you dr aman. God bless you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was amiable *** ************** diagnosed well and treatment seems okay too.Only issue was that he seemed to be in a hurry even though the clinic wasnâ€™t very busy when i visited.I understand doctors know what is medically relevant and what is not but a little more patience would make the experience better.Also I had to wait for a long time but had no pre booked appointment so would suggest you to visit this clinic only after taking an appointment.No deal breakers though so I still would recommend the doctor for his amiable nature,**** ********* *** ****** *************Unlike most medical practitioners,his prescriptions was as per norms and had clinical notes,symptoms,diagnosis as well as salt names of the medicines clearly specified.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Type 1 Diabetes Treatment,Preventive Medicine,Diabetes Management,Throat infection,backpain,
review:
Dr. Aman is a very efficient and all time full of positive energy person. 
We consult him for myself throat infections and fever most often
Diabetes for parents

He always takes time to identify root cause and prescribe medicines and advices that always works good on us. 

He treated my mother hypertension which was long persistent by identifying that she has issues with neck spondylitis and not hypertension. She is doing well without medicines now. 

We are very happy with his consultations and wish him good luck.

Now during this corona times, he is still available all the times for online consultations with same effectiveness.

Thanks to him always.
reply_text:
Nothing fills us with more joy than knowing our patients have benefitted immensely with our advise. 
Itâ€™s the biggest satisfaction for any professional. 
On top of that your appreciation really adds to the joy of satisfaction.
Hopefully , I continue to live up to the expectations of our patients .

Thank you very much

review: It was good, doctor gave us full time to go through our multiple issues. It was my 3rd visit and I am happy with the doctor advice for my father. I know that  medicine was in large quantity  but multiple issue requires more medicine, now doctor reduces some medicine as per progress.My overall experience was good. I found from the practo then visited first time,  doctor gave us proper time and I am happy with this.Also you will get a good discount on the medicine when  you visit after a week or may be on  2nd visit.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: i had little bit of swelling on face and body, was feeling tired all the time. i got an appointment via practo. He was very friendly but i was not satisfied with his treatment as he   suggested me that it could be allergy given medicine from his clinic rs 1100 for allergy and vitamins. I took medicine for 4-5 days then I called one of my relative doctor *** ***** ** ** ** * ***** **** *** * *** ********* **** ******** **** * ******* ****** ******** *** ******* *** ********* ** * ***** **** * **** ** *** ****** ****** *** ****** ** **** ********* ******** *** *** ***** ***** ** ****** *** ****** so overall my experience was not good.
reply_text:
Hello,
We have the prescription with us, when you visited me with this issue. I had written on the prescription, for which we have the proof, to get tests for allergy and thyroid done. However you didn't get back to us with reports. Please don't post lies and half baked truth. Let the people here full truth. It was not any friend who guided you for thyroid but it was written on my prescription.
Anothe Lie is about the medicines, consult fees was 500 and rest of them were medicines.
Unfortunate to have lies and half baked truth written on our portals when we are trying to work honestly.

review: I took my mother 68 yrs old for BP and Sugar diagnose on 6th April. Did not had good experience. He gave me his number for emergency purpose. I messaged him on 8th April that my mother is not doing good (vomiting) and he should advise what to do next. His only response was OK. And never replied back the whole day.  Finally I had to consult another doctor. I will never refer anyone to consult him.
reply_text:
Yes we have been too busy lately , and we missed ur message. However , there are 4 other numbers given , u May always call on them in any case of emergency . My OPD is always very busy and we still help hundreds of patient everyday. However if any message is missed , kindly call us on other numbers . 
Secondly if any patients vomits or have any acidity , itâ€™s not a validation that he doesnâ€™t have experience . Thatâ€™s too premature a statement to make by any way. 

Last thing is good u took ur mother to emergency care at another place , u could have brought her here as well in our emergency .

Itâ€™s not advisable to change ur doctors every day .

She is 68 and should be having a stable family
Physician.
Itâ€™s even difficult to understand that tou havenâ€™t found a family physician yet whom u can trust ğŸ™


Doctors are not to be changed every 2-3 days ğŸ™
